display_name: Apnea Hypopnea Index: (Respiratory events with > 50% flow reduction and >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / hours of estimated sleep from type III home sleep apnea test
description: Apnea and hypopnea events were not distinguished as separate event types during scoring. Both were classified as a respiratory event that required a 50% reduction in Nasal Flow signal and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation for at least 10 seconds.
